title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
ou need to get to the Iron Throne. Your interaction with him will update Save the Gondians. After you tell him where you are going, he will agree to take you in.

Note: You need to carefully select your team and spells before you reach the Iron Throne. Once you land on Iron Throne, you will have only 8 turns to extract as many prisoners as possible and Escape to the submersible to dock before the Throne collapses. Dimension Door and Teleportation Circle spells are very helpful, as well as the Po
